name: Leonardo da Vinci
what_did:
Leonardo painted famous works like the Mona Lisa and The Last Supper.
He sketched ideas for flying machines, tanks, and robots.
He studied everything from anatomy to nature and machines.
why_matters:
Da Vinci showed that art and science can work together.
He was curious about everything and full of creative ideas.
His notebooks inspire inventors and artists to this day.
